text: Pavel Osipovich Sukhoi (; , Paviel Vosipavič Suchi; 22 July 1895 – 15 September 1975) was a Soviet aircraft designer and founder of Sukhoi. ==Other websites== * GlobalSecurity.org Category:1895 births Category:1975 deaths Category:People from Vitebsk Region Category:Soviet engineers Category:Soviet politicians Category:Recipients of the Order of Lenin
title: Pavel Sukhoi
